item.title: Time for Tea Card Game
item.description:
Project Objective

To design a game for families and friends that creates opportunities for connection while celebrating tea.

Target Audience

Tea drinkers and families or groups of friends who enjoy playing games together.

Design Process

Hand drawing assets to develop characters representing different tea-making ingredients, vectorizing them, and creating playing cards that are visually engaging and usable.

Design Challenges

Designing a rule set thatâ€™s simple enough for children while still being enjoyable for other age groups, and determining the right number of cards to ensure proper gameplay balance.
